item.title: PCAOB Enforcement Actions (Part 2)
item.description: .figcaption { font-size: 0.8em; } .body { background-color: #fcfcfc; } .img { height: auto; max-width: 100%; background-color: #fcfcfc; } .html { height: auto; max-width: 100%; } .full-width { left: 50%; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto; max-width: 70vw; position: relative; right: 50%; width: 70vw; } .most-width { left: 50%; margin-left: -40vw; margin-right: -40vw; max-width: 80vw; position: relative; right: 50%; width: 80vw; } .box-width{ left: 50%; margin-left: -35vw; margin-right: -35vw; max-width: 70vw; position: relative; right: 50%; width: 70vw; } Unlike inspections, sanction reports have not changed much in content throughout the history of the PCAOB.
